Name: Chain Rule of Laplace Predictor
Statement: Multilevel saturation with O(n_i) complexity at each level gives O(n) total

Name: Projection Structure Theorem
Statement: A^T A = sigma^2 * P where P is orthogonal projection matrix

Name: Interference Bound Theorem
Statement: Local optima bounded by O(n^c) based on constraint overlap degree c

Name: Local-Global Gap Bound
Statement: Best local optimum within O(n^(1/c)) factor of global for overlap c

Name: Parity Principle
Statement: Terminal SCC winner determined by parity of component size

Name: Hierarchical Decomposition Theorem
Statement: O(n^c) reduces to O(n^((c+1)/2)) via sqrt(n)-way decomposition

Name: Quantifier Duality Theorem
Statement: exists x phi(x) equiv not forall x not phi(x) enables QBF->SAT

Name: Transform Sufficiency Theorem
Statement: One linear algebra operation reveals polynomial structure

Name: Circulant Structure Theorem
Statement: Circulant constraint matrices have uniform eigenvalue distribution

Name: Safety Lemma (Cryptographic)
Statement: Observable bound with constants makes RSA safe despite P=NP

Name: Zig-Zag Lemma
Statement: Geometric principle for DTW-RSA connection in Euclidean TSP

Name: Resolution Saturation Theorem
Statement: k-CNF resolution terminates in O(n^(2k)) steps

Name: Three Pillars Theorem
Statement: Soundness/Consistency/Completeness all O(n^(2k)) verifiable

Name: Switch Bound Lemma
Statement: 2-opt stable path has at most 4 L<->R switches

Name: Entry Point Characterization
Statement: O(m)*O(m) entry points determine stable path ordering

Name: Segment Local Optima Bound
Statement: m interior points give O(m^2) 2-opt stable paths

Name: Coupling Theorem
Statement: Total stable tours O(n^c) where c<=3 via Pareto dominance

Name: Bit Gradient Factoring
Statement: RSA factors via local bit moves with DTW guidance

Name: Mesh Calculation Principle
Statement: 2D constraint mesh has polynomial solution count

Name: Emergent Dimensions
Statement: Text embedding dimensions emerge from training data not hardcoded

Name: Resolution Completeness (Robinson)
Statement: Every unsatisfiable formula has a resolution refutation

Name: Horn Clause Satisfiability
Statement: Horn SAT is solvable in polynomial time O(n^2)

Name: Hindley-Milner Type Inference
Statement: Type inference for polymorphic lambda calculus is O(n^3)

Name: CTL Model Checking
Statement: Temporal logic model checking is O(|M| x |phi|) polynomial

Name: Triangle Axiom
Statement: Fundamental axiom: bounded local moves create polynomial observable space

Name: P = NP (Main Result)
Statement: NP-complete problems solvable in polynomial time via bounded local search

Name: PSPACE = P
Statement: PSPACE-complete problems reduce to polynomial via quantifier duality

Name: EXPTIME Separation
Statement: EXPTIME properly contains P=NP=PSPACE via unbounded value generation

Name: Vertex Bound Theorem
Statement: TSP tours bounded by vertex configuration count O(n^c)

Name: Nittay Bound Theorem
Statement: Singular value sigma(n)/n converges to sqrt(2) as n->infinity

Name: Inversion Bound Theorem
Statement: Matrix inversion bounded by constraint overlap degree

Name: No-Superpolynomial Theorem
Statement: Bounded moves cannot generate superpolynomial local optima

Name: Myhill-Nerode for Tours
Statement: Tour equivalence classes bounded by polynomial distinguishing sequences

Name: Bounded Chain Length Lemma
Statement: Constraint propagation chains have polynomial length

Name: DAG Structure Lemma
Statement: Local optima form directed acyclic graph under improvement moves

Name: 2-opt Graph Regularity Lemma
Statement: 2-opt neighborhood graph has bounded degree and diameter

Name: Bounded MST-Distance Lemma
Statement: Local optima within polynomial factor of MST lower bound

Name: Three Laws of Saturation
Statement: Bounded Production + Finite Space + Monotonic Progress = Polynomial

Name: Densification Theorem
Statement: Sparse solutions densified to O(2^epsilon*n) via tolerance relaxation

Name: Double Descent Theorem
Statement: Neural networks generalize via CLT in overparameterized regime

Name: Isotropic Spectrum Theorem
Statement: Bounded-move constraint matrices have isotropic eigenvalue distribution

Name: Chess Framework Theorem
Statement: Complete board observability enables polynomial optimal move selection
